title: Flame Angel
description: Little did Angie know she was about to attract the most dangerous man in town — Kraid Devon, the Dragon. Or that the attraction would be wildly mutual. Angie has an affinity to fire. Especially the kind of fire she creates with a certain Dragon, despite the fact he's the scariest man she's ever met.Devon intends to capture the fiery witch, and keep her as his own, no matter what it takes. It's been foretold. See just how hot things really get…when fire meets fire.Reader This book contains shapeshifter sex, multiple partners and several m/f/m scenes.
author: Lisa Andel
